name: Frontline Evil Dead Zombies Killer
description:
***Become an ultimate zombie shooting champion in horror city***
Get ready to catch the most intimating and extreme zombie fighting and killing action game where danger is on every footstep. An impressive first-person 3D adventure blending stunning graphics. Over 8 multiple weapons to choose from including katana to sniper gun. Every weapon has been realistically recreated and each has a unique feel and performance. Let the zombies die in dark. Different zombies come with different abilities to check your fighting skills. You will also face zombie dogs that look like a horror movie evil dog to hunt you down. Set your nerve to the highest level to deal with different zombie types. Experience real 3d shooting war as zombie hunter. Be a frontline assassin killer to smash zombies with guns like sniper, assault rifles like ak47 mp5 and machine guns.

How to play:
- Control aim by touching, half right side of screen is dedicated for aiming of your apple device ipad iphone device.
- Tap fire button located at right bottom of your ipad iphone devices.
- Press Zoom to take a close look at zombies.
- Tap on switch gun to switch between guns.
- You can buy bullets and health at run time by tapping on health bar and bullet as per required.
- 6 thrilling missions.
